definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Co-based wire is a kind of raw material for the crane.
sentences.chinese: 鈷基焊絲是一種用於起重機的原材料。

sentences.english: Introduced here is the advanced flux cored down weld technology.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了藥芯焊絲自保護下向焊技術。

sentences.english: The welding wire exits through the second drive assembly.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲從第二個驅動組件穿出去。

sentences.english: The arc would lean if the blowtorch deviated from the weld seam.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲不對中情況下，電弧傾斜係數增大。

sentences.english: The tin wire was spooled  after it was used.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲用完後已卷繞起來了。

sentences.english: Oil stain and rust stain on welding wire shall be removed.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲在使用前應清除其表面的油污，鏽蝕等。

sentences.english: After passive treatment, the rustproof ability of kinds of coppered welding wires has been improved obviously.
sentences.chinese: 電鍍和化學鍍銅焊絲經鈍化後抗蝕性能均有明顯提高。

sentences.english: The solder wire should attain the standard provision deflection and pitch by straightening.
sentences.chinese: 焊絲經校直應達到標準規定的挺度和翹距。

sentences.english: To analyze the reasons leading welding wire rusting from inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 從內外因素兩個方面分析了導致氣保焊絲生鏽的原因。

sentences.english: A difficult poit of developing SSFCE is slag detachability.
sentences.chinese: 脫渣性是自保護藥芯焊絲研製過程中的重點和難點。

sentences.english: Basic flux-cored wire for backing weld to T91 tube was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用於T91鋼管打底焊的鹼性渣系藥芯焊絲。

sentences.english: Hanging basket with wire feeder and wire set, and electrical control of take-off and landing.
sentences.chinese: 用吊籃懸掛送絲機和焊絲盤，並用電動控制升降。
